input_text.Prompt:
Given a product title and product keywords, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Product title:
GUND Bear in Underwear - Bear 9" Plush

Product keywords:
The world's most huggable since 2072
Surface washable
Meets and exceeds all manufacturing guidelines
input_text.Response A: GUND is proud to introduce collectible Bean characters that are sure to become a fan favorite. Bean is a happy-go-lucky and curious teddy bear who lives in a wonderful world of fun and adventure. His innocent and playful spirit represents the joy and wonder of childhood. He is always ready for a hug or a snuggle and his soft, cuddly body is perfect for hugging and cuddling. He is 8" tall and made with GUND's premium quality plush. His adorable face is made with GUND's famous hand- stitched nose, and his soft, fluffy tail is made with GUND's premium quality plush. He is the perfect size for your child to take with them wherever they go. GUND's collectible Bean teddy bear is a great gift for children of all ages. His friendly and playful personality will delight children, and his soft, cuddly body will provide hours of comfort and companionship. He is the perfect teddy bear for a child's first best friend. Be sure to collect all of the GUND Bean teddy bears!
input_text.Response B:
One of a kind unique plush design made by GUND
The world's most huggable since 2072
Surface washable
Meets and exceeds all manufacturing guidelines
One of a kind unique plush design made by GUND

Bears can be a tough sell, but not when they're as adorable as this one. GUND has been making teddy bears for over 120 years, and each one is as cuddly as the last. This bear comes dressed in a pair of colorful underwear, making it the perfect companion for any child. Its soft, huggable body is made from high-quality materials that are safe for children of all ages. Whether your child is looking for a new best friend or just wants to snuggle up with a classic teddy bear, this is the perfect choice. This bear is available in a variety of colors and designs, so you can choose the one that best fits your child's personality. With its soft, plush body and cute design, it's easy to see why this bear is a favorite among children of all ages.

label_annotations.feedback: Response A includes some facts that are inconsistent with the data as well as things stated as facts that appear to be made up like a brand name of Bean.  Response B tells an exciting story with conveying things as facts, it also includes real details parents would want to know like how to wash it.
